                                Portobello mushrooms, bell peppers, Fontina and Mozzarella, field greens, tomatoes and homemade sun-dried tomato aioli.  Served with your choice of herb onion or herb cheese focaccia and your choice of a cup of soup, classic Caesar salad or Szechuan slaw.

	<script id="locationListHolderTmpl" type="text/x-jquery-tmpl">
	
		<div id="asideResultsHeader">
			<ul class="searchHeader">
				<li class="first">Search Results for "${sars}"</li>
				<li>${totalResults} Total Results</li>
			</ul>
			
			<ul class="detailsHeader">
				<li class="first">Location Details</li>
				<li><a>&#9664; Back to Location Results</a></li>
			</ul>
			
		</div>
		
		<div id="asideResultsTopPager">
			<ul class="pager">
			
				{{if locations.length > 1}}
					<li class="prevArrow" data-pageIndex="${currentPageIndex-1}">&#9664;</li>
					
			        {{each(i, page) locations}}
			            <li{{if i == currentPageIndex}} class="current"{{/if}} data-pageIndex="${i}">${i + 1}</li>
			        {{/each}}
			        
					<li class="nextArrow" data-pageIndex="${currentPageIndex+1}">&#9654;</li>
				{{/if}}
				
			</ul>
		</div>
		
		<div id="asideResultsList">
			{{tmpl "#locationListTmpl"}}
		</div>
		
		<div id="asideResultsBottomPager">
			<ul class="pager">
			
				{{if locations.length > 1}}
					<li class="prevArrow" data-pageIndex="${currentPageIndex-1}">&#9664;</li>
					
			        {{each(i, page) locations}}
			            <li{{if i == currentPageIndex}} class="current"{{/if}} data-pageIndex="${i}">${i + 1}</li>
			        {{/each}}
			        
					<li class="nextArrow" data-pageIndex="${currentPageIndex+1}">&#9654;</li>
				{{/if}}
				
			</ul>
		</div>
		
	</script>
<!-- *****locationListHolderTmpl******-->

<!-- *****locationListTmpl******-->
	<script id="locationListTmpl" type="text/x-jquery-tmpl">
	
		{{if locations[currentPageIndex] && locations[currentPageIndex].length > 0}}
		
			<ol class="listings results new" start="${ (perPage * currentPageIndex) + 1 }">
			
				{{each(i, location) locations[currentPageIndex]}}
				
					<li data-latitude="${location.coordinates[0]}" data-longitude="${location.coordinates[1]}" data-name="${location.name}" data-index="${ (perPage * currentPageIndex) + i }" data-locationID="${location.id}" data-locationID="${location.id}">

						<div>
							<div class="listing">
								{{if distance > 0}}
									(${location.distance} Miles)<br />
								{{/if}}
								<a class="locationName" rel="locationDetails" data-id="${location.store_id} | ${location.name}, ${location.city}, ${location.state}">${location.name}</a><br />
								${location.address_line_one}<br />
								
								{{if address_line_two}}
								    ${location.address_line_two}<br />
								{{/if}}
								
								${location.city}, ${location.state} ${location.postal_code}<br />
								${location.phone}<br />
								
							</div>
							
							<div class="rightBtns">
								<a class="locationDetailsLink icon-arrow1" rel="locationDetails" data-id="${location.store_id} | ${location.name}, ${location.city}, ${location.state}">Location Details</a>
								{{if snapfinger_id}}
								<a data-id="${location.store_id} | ${location.name}, ${location.city}, ${location.state}" class="button-small" href="http://www.snapfinger.com/menus/CPK/default.aspx?SiteID=${location.snapfinger_id}" title="Order Online"><span>Order Online</span></a>
								{{/if}}
						
								
							</div>
							
							<ul class="locationIcons">
								<li class="home" alt="Set as Home Location" title="Set as Home Location"></li>
							</ul>
						</div>
					
					</li>
		
				{{/each}}
		
			</ol>
		{{else}}
		
			<div class="noResults">
			${error}
			{{if suggestions.length > 0}} <span id="didja-mean">Did you mean one of the following?</span>{{/if}}

			{{if suggestions}}

				<ol id="suggestions">

				{{each(i, suggestion) suggestions}}
					<li {{if location_name}}class="exact" data-id="${location_id}"{{/if}}>
					<span>{{if location_name}} ${location_name}, {{/if}} {{if city_name}} ${city_name}, {{/if}} {{if state_code}} ${state_code} {{/if}}</span>
					</li>
					{{/each}}
				</ol>
			{{/if}}
			</div>
		{{/if}}
		
	</script>
<!-- *****locationListTmpl******-->


<!-- *****locationDetailsTmpl******-->
	<script id="locationDetailsTmpl" type="text/x-jquery-tmpl">

		<ol class="listings details" start="${index+1}">
			<li data-latitude="${coordinates[0]}" data-longitude="${coordinates[1]}" data-name="${name}" data-index="${index}" data-locationID="${id}">
				<div>
					<div class="listing">
						{{if distance > 0}}
							(${distance} Miles)<br />
						{{/if}}

						{{if address_line_two}}
						    ${address_line_two}<br />
						{{/if}}
						
						
						${city}, ${state} ${postal_code}<br />
						
						{{if address_tip}}

						{{/if}}

					</div>
				
					{{if snapfinger_id}}

						<a class="button-small" href="http://www.snapfinger.com/menus/CPK/default.aspx?SiteID=${snapfinger_id}" title="Order Online" data-id="${location.store_id} | ${location.name}, ${location.city}, ${location.state}"><span>Order Online</span></a>
					</div>
					{{/if}}
					<ul class="locationIcons">

					</ul>

					</div>

					</div>

	</script>

		<hgroup><h1>Make Your Event Simple + Delicious</h1></hgroup>
		<p>CPK offers catering items that help make your events easy to manage and deliver the delicious flavors you're accustomed to. In addition, our restaurant managers and team of catering experts can help plan or customize a menu that will make your guests happy and well fed.</p>

					<h1>COMBOS</h1>
					<h2>All combos include a choice of these salads:<br/>

<aside class="main">
	<div>
		<hgroup>

	<section class="generic">
		<hgroup class="main-title"><h1>Let Us Help You Plan Your Menu</h1></hgroup>
           
			<p>Let us help design a menu for you. Our catering team is brimming with menu ideas for your upcoming occasion whether it's an executive board meeting, a party at home, an end-of-season sporting event featuring our Mobile Kitchen or just about any large affair.</p>
			<p>We just need a few details so we can start planning your event. Fill out the form below, or you may contact us at <a href="mailto:catering@cpk.com">catering@cpk.com</a>.</p>

			</section>

	<section class="generic w65">
		<hgroup><h1>CPK, Coming Soon to a Parking Spot Near You</h1></hgroup>
		<p>The CPK Mobile Kitchen&ndash;available in Southern California&mdash;is a professionally-staffed, fully-stocked restaurant on wheels that's ready to get trucking and turn heads at your next event. Complete with ovens, saut&eacute; stations and coolers, our state-of-the-art mobile kitchen provides everything we need to cook made-to-order CPK specialties for your hungry guests. </p>
		<p>The CPK Mobile Kitchen requires an 80 ft. x 40 ft. parking space with 14 1/2 ft. of overhead clearance. </p>
	</section>
	<section class="generic w65">
		<hgroup><h1>We'll Bring Everything, Including the Kitchen Sink</h1></hgroup>
		<p>That's right, we don't just bring our innovative menu to your event, we bring the entire kitchen and our experienced staff too! CPK's Pop-up Kitchens are equipped with everything we need to prepare and serve made-to-order CPK favorites onsite at your event. Fun and familiar, we're easy to pick out in a crowd and ever so eager to please.</p>
		<p>All we need is a 20 ft. x 20 ft. space to impress the heck out of your guests.</p>
	</section>

			  })();

			</script>

    </section>


        <section class="generic">
                <hgroup><h1>From a legendary pizza to a global brand</h1></hgroup>
                <div class="cols2">
			<p>We opened our first restaurant In Beverly Hills in 1985. Former federal prosecutors Rick Rosenfield and Larry Flax combined their passion for food with fresh high-quality ingredients to create innovative, hearth-baked pizzas such as The Original BBQ Chicken, Thai Chicken, and Jamaican Jerk Chicken, cooked in an open kitchen. The restaurant gave California a place in the pizza pantheon alongside Chicago and New York. Our California twist on global flavors resonated with guests, and almost immediately, CPK became a bustling spot for business and family gatherings.</p>
<p>Almost immediately after the first location opened, we expanded from California to more than 250 locations in more than 30 states and 11 countries. But it doesn't stop there; you'll also find us bringing smiles to the pizza aisle in your grocer's freezer, taking the edge off travel fatigue in major airports all over the world, feeding eager fans at sports stadiums and students on college campuses.</p>
<p>California Pizza Kitchen completed an initial public offering in August 2000 and traded on the NASDAQ National Market under the ticker symbol CPKI. On July 7, 2011, Golden Gate Capital completed the acquisition of CPK and as a result of the acquisition, the company&rsquo;s common stock is no longer publicly traded.</p>
<p>On August 18, 2011, G.J. Hart was named President, Chief Executive Officer and Executive Chairman.</p>
                </div>
        </section>
</div>

	<hgroup class="main-title"><h1>Press Room</h1></hgroup>
    
    

    <section class="main-slider">

	<section class="intro">
		<p>The CPK story has been told by local, national and international media. From the pages of major magazines and newspapers like People, Business Week and Fortune to <em>The Oprah Winfrey Show</em>, <em>Ellen</em> and <em>Today</em>, our trend-setting cuisine continues to intrigue.</p>
		<a class="button3" href="/company/press-room/inquiry/">
			<span>If you're a member of the media</span>
			<span>request information Here</span>
		</a>
	</section>

	<section class="intro generic">
		<hgroup><h1>CPKids Have More Fun</h1></hgroup>
		<p>From our popular CPKids Programs, Birthday Parties and behind-the-counter Restaurant Tours, to our award-winning CPKids Menu and FUNdraising programs, we&#39;re passionate about supporting children in our local communities and delivering memorable events that are tons of fun for the whole family.</p>
		<ul>
			<li>
				<a class="button3" href="http://info.cpk.com/documents/cpkids_menu.pdf" title="CPKid's Menu" target="_blank">
					<span>Food, Activities and More!</span>
					<span>CPK<span class="case_default">ids</span> Menu</span>
				</a>
			</li>
			<li>
				<a class="button3" href="http://assets.fbmta.com/clt/cpk/lp/join/join.asp" title="Register for the CPKids Birthday Club">
					<span>Register for our eclub and</span>
					<span>CPK<span class="case_default">ids</span> Birthday Club</span>
				</a>
			</li>
		</ul>
		
	</section>
	
	<section class="tabs clearfix tabs-generic">
		<div class="tab first">
			<hgroup><h2>FUNdraisers</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>
					CPK <a href="http://www.cpk.com/uploads/documents/fundraiser_guide_for_the_event_host.pdf" target="_blank">FUNdraisers</a> are as unique and fun as our menu. We would love to help you raise money for your school or non-profit organization with a FUNdraising event. The events are easy to arrange and everyone you invite will enjoy food from our innovative menu. Best of all, 20% of sales generated from supporters of your organization will be donated back to you! We give priority to groups that focus on children, education and youth sports.
					<a href="/company/fundraise/" title="" class="button4">Let's Fundraise</a>
				</p>				
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/company/cpkids/fundraisers_company.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="tab">
			<hgroup><h2>Birthday Parties</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>
					<a href="http://info.cpk.com/documents/cpkids_birthday_party_program_flyer.pdf" target="_blank">A birthday at CPK</a> creates delicious memories. Kids can play chef and make their own pizza from the freshest ingredients. The fun also includes a VIP&ndash;style behind-the-counter restaurant tour, a meal from our award-winning CPKids menu and a certificate for a free CPKids Meal for each child&rsquo;s next visit. We also spoil the birthday child with a CPKids chef jacket! Wanna give all the little chefs an extra party favor? Additional CPKids chef jackets and/or aprons are also available for purchase. Click below and a Manager will contact you with scheduling and pricing details.
					<a href="/company/cpkids/birthdays/" title="" class="button4">Celebrate with CPK</a>
				</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/company/cpkids/bdays_company.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="tab">
			<hgroup><h2>Restaurant Tours</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>
					Every kid gets a thrill discovering how things work. A free VIP-style restaurant tour at CPK is a unique opportunity to step behind the counter and see what happens in our kitchens. Kids will love learning the secrets about pizza making from the experts in our hands-on pizza demo. Each kid also receives an activity book, CPKids pencil, and a certificate for a free CPK Meal on their next visit. Behind-the-scenes tours are free for schools and non-profit organizations and recommended for kids ages 10 and younger. Contact a CPK Manager to learn more.
					<a href="/company/cpkids/tours/" title="" class="button4">Book a Tour Date</a>
				</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/company/cpkids/tours_company.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="panel-display clearfix">
			<div class="details"><div></div></div>
		</div>
	</section>
</div>

	<section class="tabs clearfix tabs-generic">
		<div class="header">
			<hgroup><h1>Lending a Hand</h1></hgroup>
			<p>Promoting positive change has inspired us since the very beginning and is built into the DNA of CPK. We are committed to doing good in the communities we serve and are determined to make a real difference through CPK-branded FUNdraisers, In-kind Donations, our CPK Foundation which has donated more than $1 million to the Starlight Children's Foundation.</p>
		</div>
		<div class="tab first">
			<hgroup><h2>FUNdraisers</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>
					CPK <a href="http://www.cpk.com/uploads/documents/fundraiser_guide_for_the_event_host.pdf" target="_blank">FUNdraisers</a> are unique and fun as our menu. We would love to help you raise money for your school or non-profit organization with a FUNdraising event. The events are easy to arrange and everyone you invite will enjoy food from our innovative menu. Best of all, 20% of sales generated from supporters of your organization will be donated back to you! We give priority to groups that focus on children, education and youth sports.
					<a href="/company/fundraise/" title="" class="button4">Let's Fundraise</a>
				</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/company/community/fundraisers_company.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="tab">
			<hgroup><h2>The CPK Foundation</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>
					Giving back is a cornerstone of our philosophy at CPK. The California Pizza Kitchen Foundation was founded in 2000 with the goal making a real difference in the communities we serve.<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;

	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman","serif";}
</style>
<![endif]-->The foundation supports numerous children&rsquo;s charities across the country and has donated more than $1 million to the Starlight Children's Foundation to support a series of CPKids Camps where seriously ill children and their families can enjoy pizza and fun in a safe nurturing environment. And that's something we feel really good about!					
				</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/company/community/cpk-foundation_company.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="tab">
			<hgroup><h2>Local Donations</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>
					CPK is here to help, and wants to work with you to make a difference. CPK restaurants contribute thousands of dollars of in-kind donations to various organizations, including many that serve children in need. We also support our local communities with a scrip gift card program, and are proud to donate all the proceeds from our CPK cookbooks to children's charities. Contact the manager at your <a href="http://www.cpk.com/locations/">local CPK</a> and find out how we can work together to create positive change.										
					<a href="/locations/" title="" class="button4">Find Your Local CPK</a>
				</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/company/community/in-kind-donations_company.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="panel-display clearfix">
			<div class="details"><div></div></div>
		</div>
	</section>
</div>

	<div>

		<hgroup><h1>Our Kitchen or Yours</h1></hgroup>
		<p><p>Prepare your favorite CPK dishes in the comfort of your own kitchen with recipes from our three cookbooks. 100 percent of cookbook proceeds are donated to children's charities through our charitable foundation.</p>
<ul>
<li>Enjoy easy-to-follow recipes from "The California Pizza Kitchen Cookbook"</li>
<li>Explore the CPK menu with the "Pasta, Salads, Soups and Sides Cookbook"</li>
<li>Cook with your kids with "The California Pizza Kitchen Family Cookbook"</li>
</ul></p>

		<div>
			Ask any CPK employee why they like working here and they'll say, "the people." Of course, it doesn't hurt that it's a place of passion, encouragement, hard work and opportunity. And the benefits are awesome! Healthcare, CPK meals, dining discounts, a 401(k) plan, anniversary bonus, and much more! Working at CPK, you'll know you're part of something special - part of a team working toward a common goal.

		<section class="intro">
			
			
				<p>We love opening new restaurants, which is why we're always looking for new sites across the country. If you have a location that is 5,000-6,000 square feet, that you think would be perfect for a CPK restaurant, please tell us. </p>
				<p>It's easy, just fill out and submit the form below and we'll be happy to take a look. We do get loads of inquiries, and while we can't respond to every site submitted, we do review them all and if we are interested, we will get back to you. </p>
				<a href="/locations/" title="View Our U.S. Locations" class="button3">
					<span>View Our</span>
					<span>U.S. Locations</span>

		<section class="intro">
			
			<p>California Pizza Kitchen is always looking for passionate, experienced partners to help us expand into new markets as we continue to grow our worldwide brand. We provide best-in-class training and development in all areas of our business in addition to on-the-ground support.</p>
			<p>If you meet the following requirements, fill out and submit the form. A representative from our Franchise Department will review your information and reply to your inquiry as quickly as possible.</p>

			<a href="/locations/#international" title="View Our International Locations" class="button3">
				<span>View Our</span>
				<span>International Locations</span>
			</a>
			
		</section>

		<form enctype="multipart/form-data" action="/real-estate/international/" method="POST" class="generic" novalidate>
			<hgroup>
				<h2>International Real Estate Inquiry Form</h2>
				<a href="#" class="icon-arrow3 showrequirements">View Requirements</a>
			</hgroup>
			<section class="requirements">
				<hgroup><h4>Requirements</h4></hgroup>
				<ul>
					<li>Proven track record in the restaurant industry</li>
					<li>Current ownership of multiple restaurants with an established infrastructure, preferably full service U.S. brands</li>
					<li>Previous franchise restaurant experience</li>
					<li>Strong knowledge of market trends, real estate, governmental issues, distribution and labor</li>
					<li>Minimum of $5 Million total net worth</li>
					<li>Minimum of $2 Million cash available for investment</li>
					<li>Franchise partner must have the resources and be willing to send multiple managers and several key restaurant employees to California for a three-month training program.</li>
					<li>All minimum requirements are subject to California Pizza Kitchen's collective evaluation of the potential franchise partner</li>
				</ul>
				<a href="#" class="hide-panel">Hide Requirements</a>
			</section>

            <ul class="clearfix" id="main-slider">

                    <h2></h2>

	<section class="faq-list">
		<hgroup>
			<h1>General</h1>
			
		</hgroup>
		
		
		<ol>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Where is CPK headquartered and how do I contact you?</span>
				<p>We call our headquarters the Restaurant Support Center. We're located at: 6053 West Century Blvd. Suite 1100 Los Angeles, CA 90045-6430 Tel-310-342-5000 Fax-310-342-4640 Contact one of our locations Contact us about your experience at one our restaurants or call 1-800-91-WECARE.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What is California Pizza Kitchen?</span>
				<p>Since 1985, California Pizza Kitchen has served innovative cuisine with a signature twist that's globally inspired yet distinctly California. Our delicious hearth-baked pizzas, pastas, soups, sandwiches, appetizers and desserts are available at more than 260 full-service restaurants. You'll also find a selection of our original creations at airports, sports stadiums and universities throughout the country, as well as in your grocer's freezer.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">How do I contact you about a recent experience I had as a guest at CPK?</span>
				<p>Please tell us about your dining experience by clicking on any of the <a href="http://webhost.cpk.com/contactus/contactus.asp">Contact Us</a> links on the site or by calling 1-800-91-WE-CARE between 7:00 am and 12:00 am Pacific Time.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">How do I purchase CPK Gift Cards?</span>
				<p>You can purchase CPK Gift Cards from all of our full-service <a href="http://www.cpk.com/locations">California Pizza Kitchen</a> locations. You can also <a href="http://www.cpkcard.com/splash.aspx">order gift cards online</a> today!</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Do you sell any products in the grocery store?</span>
				<p>Yes, you can find many of your favorite CPK pizzas in your grocer&rsquo;s freezer. They are manufactured and distributed by Nestl&eacute;&rsquo;s Pizza division</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">How do I get my hands on your delicious recipes?</span>
				<p>We proudly share many of our favorite recipes. CPK has three cookbooks available for sale in all of our restaurants, bookstores and&nbsp;<a href="http://www.amazon.com/California-Pizza-Kitchen-Family-Cookbook/dp/047022939X/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&amp;s=books&amp;qid=1220387557&amp;sr=1-1">online</a>. All proceeds go to the&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/company/community-relations/">California Pizza Kitchen Foundation</a>, which supports children's charities from coast to coast.&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/company/cpk-cookbooks/">Learn more about our cookbooks</a>.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Does California Pizza Kitchen franchise?</span>
				<p>At this time, California Pizza Kitchen does not franchise in the US. CPK does franchise internationally to companies that own full-service restaurant chains.&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/real-estate/international/">Learn more about international franchising</a>.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">I&#39;ve seen CPK in airports and stadiums. Can you tell me more about that?</span>
				<p>Being in these locations is a great way to expand our brand and address the needs of discerning travelers on the go and sports fans looking for quality, innovative food. These locations are smaller than our full-service restaurants, and offer a selection of our most popular pizzas, salads, sandwiches and appetizers.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Is California Pizza Kitchen publicly traded?</span>
				<p>Shares in California Pizza Kitchen first traded on the NASDAQ National Market on August 2, 2000 under the ticker symbol CPKI.&nbsp; On July 7, 2011, CPK and Golden Gate Capital announced the successful completion of the acquisition of CPK by an affiliate of GGC. &nbsp;As a result of the acquisition, our common stock is no longer publicly traded</p>
			</li>
			
		</ol>
	</section>
</div>

	<section class="generic">
		<hgroup class="main-title"><h1>Terms of Use</h1></hgroup>
		<div class="intro">
			<p>Welcome to the cpk.com Web site (the "Site"), provided by California Pizza Kitchen, Inc. ("California Pizza Kitchen, Inc.," "CPK," "we" or us). This Agreement contains the terms and conditions upon which you ("you" or "the user") may access and use the valuable information and services available through the Site. We may modify this Agreement at any time, and such modification will be effective 30 days after either posting of the modified Agreement or notification to you. You agree to review this Agreement periodically to ensure that you are aware of any modifications. Your continued access or use of the Site shall be deemed your conclusive acceptance of the modified Agreement.
			<p>The materials ("Materials") contained in the Site are provided by CPK and may be used for informational purposes only. By downloading any of the Materials contained in any of CPK's sites, you agree to the terms and provisions as outlined in this legal notice. If you do not agree to them, do not use this site or download Materials.
		</div>
		<ol class="terms">
			<li>
				<span class="section">License.</span>
				<p>THE CONTENTS OF THIS SITE, INCLUDING ITS "LOOK AND FEEL" (E.G., TEXT, GRAPHICS, IMAGES, LOGOS, AND BUTTON ICONS), EDITORIAL CONTENT, NOTICES, SOFTWARE (INCLUDING HTML-BASED COMPUTER PROGRAMS) AND OTHER MATERIAL, ARE PROTECTED UNDER BOTH UNITED STATES AND FOREIGN COPYRIGHT, TRADEMARK, AND OTHER LAWS. These contents belong or are licensed to CPK and we hereby grant you the right to view and use this Site subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement. You may download and/or print a copy of the information provided in this Site for your internal use only. Permission to reprint or electronically reproduce any document or graphic in whole or in part for any other purpose is expressly prohibited, unless prior written consent is obtained from the respective copyright holder(s). You may contact us at the address indicated at the end of this Agreement. In any event, you agree not to modify, amend, reduce the size of or in any way obliterate any warnings, liability limitations, disclosures or notices (including any copyright or trademark notice) associated with the information.</p>
				<p>In turn, you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use any content you post on the Site for any purpose, subject to the express terms of this Agreement.</p>							
				<p>WE DO NOT AUTHORIZE OTHER WEB SITES TO LINK TO THIS SITE WITHOUT OUR PRIOR PERMISSION. Please contact us at the address indicated at the end of this Agreement should you wish to effect such a link.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Trademarks.</span>
				<p>"California Pizza Kitchen" and the stylized yellow, black and white logo are trademarks of CPK, registered in the U.S. and other countries.</p>
				<p>Other product or service names or logos referenced in the Site are either trademarks or registered trademarks of CPK. The absence of a product or service name or logo from this list does not constitute a waiver of CPK's trademark or other intellectual property rights concerning that name or logo. All other products and company names mentioned in the Site may be trademarks of their respective owners.			</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Unsolicited Idea Submission Policy.</span>
				<p>CPK or any of its employees do not accept or consider unsolicited ideas, including ideas for new advertising campaigns, new promotions, new or improved products or menu items, product enhancements, processes, recipes, materials, marketing plans or new product names. Please do not send any original creative artwork, suggestions or other works. The sole purpose of this policy is to avoid potential misunderstandings or disputes when CPK's products or marketing strategies might seem similar to ideas submitted to CPK. So, please do not send your unsolicited ideas to CPK or anyone at CPK. If, despite our request that you not send us your ideas, you still send them, then regardless of what your letter says, the following terms shall apply to your idea submission.</p>			
				<p>You agree that: (1) your ideas will automatically become the property of CPK, without compensation to you, and (2) CPK can use the ideas for any purpose and in any way, even give them to others.		
				<p>CPK does, however, welcome your feedback regarding many areas of CPK's existing business. If you want to send us your feedback, and we hope that you do, simply use our <a href="http://webhost.cpk.com/contactus/contactus.asp" title="Contact Us">Contact Us</a> page. Please provide only specific feedback on CPK's existing products or marketing strategies (do not include any ideas that CPK policy will not permit it to accept or consider). It's just one more way that CPK can learn how to best satisfy your needs.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Privacy.</span>
				<p>We respect your personal privacy and the sensitivity of your corporate information. Please see our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated by reference into this Agreement for the details of our commitment.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Your Conduct.</span>
				<p>(a) Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Agreement, using or attempting to use any engine, software, tool, agent, or other device or mechanism (including without limitation browsers, spiders, robots, avatars or intelligent agents) to navigate or search this Site other than the search engines and search agents available from CPK on this Site and other than generally available third-party web browsers (such as Netscape Communicator or Microsoft Explorer) is prohibited.</p>
				<p>(b) You may not attempt to decipher, decompile, disassemble, or reverse-engineer any of the software comprising or in any way making up a part of the Site.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Warranty Disclaimer.</span>
				<p>THE INFORMATION ON THIS SITE IS PROVIDED "AS IS." YOU EXPRESSLY ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOUR ACCESS OR USE OF THE INFORMATION IS AT YOUR SOLE RISK. THE INFORMATION ON THIS SITE MAY BE COMPILED FROM VARIOUS THIRD-PARTY CONTENT PROVIDERS ("PROVIDERS"). CPK AND ITS PROVIDERS MAKE NO REPRESENTATIONS OR ENDORSEMENT ABOUT THE SUITABILITY FOR ANY PURPOSE OF PRODUCTS AND SERVICES AVAILABLE THROUGH THE SITE. WE AND OUR PROVIDERS DO NOT GUARANTEE THE TIMELINESS, VALIDITY, COMPLETENESS OR ACCURACY OF INFORMATION MADE AVAILABLE TO YOU FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE. WE AND OUR PROVIDERS DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES AND CONDITIONS, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT, WITH REGARD TO THE PRODUCTS, SERVICES AND INFORMATION CONTAINED ON OR MADE AVAILABLE THROUGH THIS SITE, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE AVAILABILITY OF THIS SITE, LACK OF VIRUSES, WORMS, TROJAN HORSES OR OTHER CODE THAT MANIFEST CONTAMINATING OR DESTRUCTIVE PROPERTIES, OR ANY FAILURE TO PROVIDE ACCESS TO THE SITE. ALTHOUGH WE OR OUR PROVIDERS MAY UPDATE THE CONTENT ON THIS SITE FROM TIME TO TIME, PLEASE NOTE THAT MEDICAL INFORMATION CHANGES RAPIDLY. THEREFORE, SOME OF THE INFORMATION MAY BE OUT OF DATE AND/OR MAY CONTAIN INACCURACIES OR TYPOGRAPHICAL ERRORS.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Waiver, Release and Limitation of Liability.</span>
				<p>YOU AGREE THAT NEITHER CPK, NOR ITS OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, OR AGENTS SHALL HAVE ANY LIABILITY TO YOU UNDER ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY OR INDEMNITY ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO USE OF THE SITE. YOU HEREBY RELEASE AND FOREVER WAIVE ANY AND ALL CLAIMS YOU MAY HAVE AGAINST CPK, ITS OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, AND AGENTS (INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO CLAIMS BASED UPON THE NEGLIGENCE OF CPK, ITS OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, OR AGENTS) FOR LOSSES OR DAMAGES YOU SUSTAIN ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO USE OF THE SITE.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Survivability of Limitation of Liability.</span>
				<p>NOTWITHSTANDING THE FOREGOING PARAGRAPH, BECAUSE SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OR LIMITATION OF LIABILITY TO THE FULL EXTENT DESCRIBED ABOVE, THESE LIMITATIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU. IF THIS LIMITATION OF LIABILITY OR EXCLUSION OF WARRANTY IS HELD TO BE INVALID OR UNENFORCEABLE FOR ANY REASON, THE MAXIMUM COLLECTIVE LIABILITY OF CPK, ITS OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, AND AGENTS, IF ANY, FOR LOSSES OR DAMAGES SHALL NOT EXCEED $500. IN NO EVENT SHALL CPK, ITS OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, OR AGENTS BE LIABLE TO YOU FOR ANY LOSSES OR DAMAGES GREATER THAN THE AMOUNT REFERRED TO ABOVE. ALL OTHER DAMAGES, DIRECT OR INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL OR PUNITIVE ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO USE OF THE SYSTEM ARE HEREBY EXCLUDED EVEN IF CPK, ITS OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, OR AGENTS HAVE BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. </p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Disclaimer of Liability for Service Interruption.</span>
				<p>NEITHER CPK, NOR ANY OF ITS AFFILIATES, DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, OR ANY PROVIDER OR THIRD-PARTY VENDOR WILL BE LIABLE OR HAVE ANY RESPONSIBILITY OF ANY KIND FOR ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE THAT YOU INCUR IN THE EVENT OF ANY FAILURE OR INTERRUPTION OF THE SYSTEM, OR RESULTING FROM THE ACT OR OMISSION OF ANY OTHER PARTY INVOLVED IN MAKING THIS SYSTEM OR THE DATA CONTAINED THEREIN AVAILABLE TO YOU, OR FROM ANY OTHER CAUSE RELATING TO YOUR ACCESS TO OR YOUR INABILITY TO ACCESS THE SYSTEM OR THESE MATERIALS, WHETHER OR NOT THE CIRCUMSTANCES GIVING RISE TO SUCH CAUSE MAY HAVE BEEN WITHIN THE CONTROL OF CPK OR OF ANY VENDOR PROVIDING SOFTWARE OR SERVICES SUPPORT.	</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Third Party Rights.</span>
				<p>The provisions of paragraphs 7, 8 and 9 apply for the benefit of CPK and its officers, directors, employees, and agents. Each of these individuals or entities shall have the right to assert and enforce those provisions directly against you on its own behalf.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Right To Terminate.</span>
				<p>CPK shall have the right to terminate your ability to use or access the Site at any time without notice to you.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Miscellaneous.</span>
				<p>(a) You agree that no joint venture, partnership, employment, or agency relationship exists between CPK and you as a result of this Agreement or your use of the Site.</p>
				<p>(b) Any cause of action or claim you may have with respect to CPK must be commenced within one (1) year after the claim or cause of action arises.</p>
				<p>(c) CPK's failure to insist upon or enforce strict performance of any provision of this Agreement shall not be construed as a waiver of any provision or right.</p>												
				<p>(d) CPK may assign its rights and duties under this Agreement to any party at any time without notice to you.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Governing Law and Forum.</span>
				<p>This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California, without regard to its provisions relating to conflicts of law. You agree that any legal action or proceeding between CPK and you for any purpose concerning this Agreement or the parties' obligations hereunder shall be brought exclusively in a court of competent jurisdiction sitting in Los Angeles, California, United States of America. In light of the nature of this Agreement, you understand and agree that money damages may be insufficient to rectify breach and that, consequently, CPK will be entitled to seek preliminary and equitable relief upon a breach of the Agreement by you.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Entire Agreement.</span>
				<p>This Agreement comprises the full and final understanding between you and CPK and merges and supersedes any and all other agreements, understandings or representations, written or oral, with respect to the subject matter hereof. The Agreement may not be modified except by a writing (in paper or electronic form) signed by you and by an authorized representative of CPK, and referring specifically to this Agreement. Neither the course of conduct between the parties nor trade practice shall act to modify any provision of this Agreement.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Severability.</span>
				<p>The provisions of this Agreement are severable, and in the event any provision hereof is determined to be invalid or unenforceable for any reason, such invalidity or unenforceability shall not in any way affect the validity or enforceability of the remaining provisions.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Notice to You.</span>
				<p>CPK may deliver notice to you under this Agreement by means of electronic mail, a general notice on the Site, or by written communication delivered by first-class U.S. mail to your address on record with CPK as part of your registration information.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Contacting Us.</span>
				
				<p>To contact us with any questions or concerns in connection with this Agreement, or to provide any notices under this Agreement, please go to <a href="http://webhost.cpk.com/contactus/contactus.asp" title="Contact Us">Contact Us</a>.</p>
				<p>The Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) provides recourse to copyright owners who believe that their rights under the United States Copyright Act have been infringed by acts of third parties over the Internet. If you believe that your copyrighted work has been copied without your authorization and is available on this Website in a way that may constitute copyright infringement, you may provide notice of your claim to CPK's Copyright Agent listed below.</p>
				<p>For your notice to be effective, it must include the following information: (i) an electronic or physical signature of the person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright interest; (ii) a description of the copyrighted work that you claim has been infringed upon; (iii) a description of where the material that you claim is infringing is located on the site, including the auction ID number, if applicable; (iv) your address, telephone number, and e-mail address; (v) a statement by you that you have a good-faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law; and (vi) a statement by you, made under penalty of perjury, that the above information in your notice is accurate and that you are the copyright owner or authorized to act on the copyright owner's behalf.</p>
				<p>CPK's Copyright Agent for notice of claims of copyright infringement on its site can be reached <a href="http://webhost.cpk.com/contactus/contactus.asp" title="Contact Us">here</a>.</p>

			</li>
		</ol>
	</section>
</div>
</div>

			<div class="clearfix">
<div id="breadcrumb"><a href="/" title="California Pizza Kitchen">Home</a> &gt; Privacy Policy</div>
<div id="main-column">
	<section class="generic">
		<hgroup class="main-title"><h1>Privacy Policy</h1></hgroup>
		<div class="intro">
			<p>
				<strong>Our Privacy Commitment To Registered Users, Last Updated: August 2011</strong><br />
				California Pizza Kitchen, Inc. ("CPK") is committed to treating the personal and corporate information of our users with respect and sensitivity. Our privacy commitment is described in this Privacy Policy. As our services evolve and we perceive the need or desirability of using information collected in other ways, we may from time to time amend this Privacy Policy. We post the effective date of our Privacy Policy on our website ("Site"). We encourage you to check our Site frequently to see the current Privacy Policy and Terms of Use in effect and any changes that may have been made to them. If we make material changes to this Policy we will post the revised Policy and the revised effective date on this Site. Please check back here periodically or contact us at the address listed at the end of this Policy. By using the Site, you are accepting the terms of this Privacy Policy. 
			</p>
			<p>This Policy is part of our Terms of Use Agreement. Please <a href="/terms/">click here</a> to see that Agreement.</p>
		</div>
		<ol class="terms">
			<li>
				<span class="section">General Information.</span>
				<p>We believe that you have the right to understand how your information is stored and used. We require that sites linked to our Site contain a notice identifying their privacy policies. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of any third parties or the content of linked sites, although we do encourage you to read the applicable privacy policies and terms and conditions of such parties or web sites.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Information You Provide Us.</span>
				<p>In general, you can visit CPK.com without telling us who you are or revealing any information about yourself. If you choose to register, and are 16 years of age or older, we will collect your name, date of birth, email address, and street address along with other information you may choose to submit, and you will choose a password as part of the registration process ("Personally Identifiable Information" or "PII"). If you make a purchase on our Site we will also ask you for additional information including the credit card number and expiration date, billing address, shipping address, name on the account and telephone numbers for the billing and shipping addresses ("Credit Card Information").</p>
				<p>For your security we do not keep or store your Credit Card Information after your purchase transaction is completed. We only share your Credit Card Information as necessary to complete your purchase transaction as disclosed in this Privacy Policy.</p>
				<p>By providing your PII to us, you explicitly agree to our collection and use of such information as described in this Privacy Policy.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Protecting Children's Privacy.</span>
				<p>We recognize that some of the users of our site may be under the age of 16 ("Minors"). We are committed to protecting Minors' privacy online and meeting the requirements of the federal Children's Online Privacy Protection Act.  While we offer programs, such as the CPKids Birthday Club, which are intended to appeal to Minors, only a parent or guardian may register a Minor in the program.  We do not collect Personally Identifiable Information directly from Minors.</p>
				<p>Although users under 16 years of age may be allowed to participate in some contests and promotions, if such a user wins, notification and prizes are sent to the parent or guardian identified in the initial registration process. We do not publish names, ages, or images for contest winners under 16 without first receiving parental or guardian consent.</p>
				<p>If you have knowledge that a child under the age of 16 has submitted Personally Identifiable Information to us or if parents or guardians want to review, change or delete their child's registration information, simply contact us via email or by clicking on the link on the registration page or by writing us at the address below. Parents can also telephone us at 310-342-5000 but before any information is disclosed the parent will be required to provide the parent's name and email address for verification. We will only send the information to the parent email address in the registration file.</p>
				<p>If a Minor who is not registered on our Site contacts CPK through an email, we will respond to that email on a one-time basis without obtaining parental consent and we will then delete the email address. We will not use that email address to contact the Minor thereafter. Our Site does not provide email services, chat rooms or message boards.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Cookies.</span>
				<p>We use cookies to personalize our Site for you and to collect aggregate information about site usage by all of our users. A cookie is a text file that our Site transfers to your computer's hard drive for record-keeping purposes and to enhance the quality of your visit to our Site. The cookie assigns a random, unique number to your computer. It does not contain information which would personally identify you, although we can associate the cookie with any personal identifying information that you provide us while visiting our Site. Our cookie records "clickstream" information (data reporting the URLs or names of the pages on our Site that you have visited). We do not allow anyone else to access your cookie.</p>
				<p>If you prefer not to receive cookies while browsing our website, you have the option to regulate the use of cookies through your Internet browser settings or other commercially available software. Doing so, however, may make some of our sites' features unavailable to you. For more information about cookies <a href="http://s3.amazonaws.com/cpk-uploads/documents/nutrition_facts.pdf">click here</a>.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Use of Information.</span>
				<p>The use of your information is subject to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use in effect at the time of use. The provisions contained herein supersede all previous notices or statements regarding our privacy practices with respect to this Site.</p>
				<p>We sometimes use aggregated data (independent of any personal identifiers) for research and commercial purposes. This information includes what areas our users visit most frequently and what services they access most often. This information helps us develop a better site that is more useful and accessible to you.</p>
				<p>We may use your PII internally, among other things, to offer our own or third-party products and services that we think you may find of interest, but only CPK, its subsidiaries and contractors involved in distributing the offers or providing the products or services will have access to your PII. Our subsidiaries and contractors will be required to use any PII we provide them only for that intended purpose.
				<p>We may use your email address to contact you to respond to your inquiries or to provide information on products or services to you. You can elect not to receive emails from us either by so indicating at the time you register, "unsubscribing" to an email you receive or by contacting us as indicated below.
				<p>We reveal Personally Identifiable Information about you to unaffiliated third parties if: (1) you request or authorize it; (2) the information is provided to help complete a transaction for you; (3) the information is provided  as we may in our sole discretion determine is necessary or reasonably required to comply with the law, applicable regulations, court orders or subpoenas, to enforce our Terms of Use or other agreements, or to protect our rights, property or safety or the rights, property or safety of our users or others (e.g., to a consumer reporting agency for fraud protection etc.); (4) the disclosure is done as part of a purchase, transfer or sale of services or assets (e.g., in the event that substantially all of our assets are acquired by another party, customer information may be one of the transferred assets); (5) the information is provided to our agents, outside vendors or service providers to perform functions on our behalf (e.g., analyzing data, providing marketing assistance, providing customer service, processing orders, etc.); or (6) to others as described in this Privacy Policy.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Opt-Out, Access, and Security.</span>
				<p>If you do not wish to receive offers or other notices from us in the future, you can "opt out" by contacting us at the address indicated at the end of this policy. In addition, if you provide us with PII, you will always have the option of requesting that the PII be removed from our system by contacting us at the address indicated at the end of this policy.</p>
				<p>To review your PII, make any changes or corrections or to request that we remove your information please contact us at the address listed below. We will try to complete your request as promptly as possible. Any changes will affect only future uses of your PII.</p>
				<p>We use industry-standard, established security measures in place in our physical facilities and in our computer systems, databases, and communications networks that are designed reasonably to protect information contained within our systems from loss, misuse or alteration.  However, no transmission of information is guaranteed to be completely secure. Unauthorized entry or use, hardware or software failure, and other factors may compromise data security. You acknowledge and agree to assume this risk when communicating with us.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Corporate Information</span>
				<p>We also protect your corporate information from use in ways that are intended to annoy or harass. We will not disclose any information that you provide us regarding your company as part of your registration except with your express consent or where necessary to provide you with a requested service. Our Terms of Use Agreement does not permit users of our Site to copy or use your corporate information to send you unsolicited communications or in other similarly improper ways.</p>
				<p>However, we are not responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of any non-public information that you provide us. If there is information that you wish to protect from disclosure to others, do not provide it to us.</p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<span class="section">Contact Us</span>
				<p>This site is owned and operated by California Pizza Kitchen, Inc. If you have any questions or suggestions with respect to this policy, or if you wish to ask us to delete, correct, or show you your information as provided above simply click on Contact Us.</p>
			</li>
		</ol>
	</section>
</div>
</div>

			<script type="text/javascript">
				var STATIC_URL = "http://d149n29we98a20.cloudfront.net/static/";
				(function () {
				
					Modernizr.load([{

						<div class='row required full selectbox'>
	                        
	                            <div>
	                        
	                        <span>
	                        	<label for="id_conviction_felony">Have you ever been convicted of, plead guilty, no contest or nolo contendere, to a felony?&dagger;</label>
	                        </span>
	                        <select name="conviction_felony" id="id_conviction_felony">
<option value="" selected="selected">---------</option>
<option value="1">Yes</option>
<option value="0">No</option>
<option value="2">Decline to state</option>
</select>
	                        </div>
	    					
                            
                                <p class="description">&dagger;Do not report any conviction that has been sealed, expunged, statutorily eradicated, annulled, impounded, erased, dismissed under the First Offender’s law, pardoned by the Governor or which state law allows you to lawfully deny as set forth below.  You are also not required to disclose violations, infractions, misdemeanors or summary offenses.</p>
                                <p class="description">A conviction will not necessarily be a bar to employment. This information will only be used for job-related purposes consistent with applicable law and is only relevant in determining whether the conviction is related to the job for which you are applying. Factors such as age at the time of the offense(s), recentness of the offense(s), seriousness of the offense(s), nature of the violation(s), its relation, if any, to the job you are seeking, and rehabilitation will be taken into account.  Failure to honestly answer these questions will result in discontinued consideration of your application or termination of employment.</p>
                                <p class="description">
	<strong>&dagger;California applicant/residents: </strong>You need not disclose any referral to, and participation in, any pre-trial or post-trial diversion program.  Do not list any felony marijuana convictions under California Health and Safety Code Section 11360 (c) which occurred prior to 1976.</p>
                                <p class="description" id="initial-here-parent">California applicants should also read and acknowledge, by initialing, the following statement: <span id="initial-here">Initial here</span></p>
                            
                            
                                               
	                    </div>
					
                
            
          
            
            
                
                    
						<div class='row optional full'>
	                        
	                            <div>
	                        
	                        <span>
	                        	<label for="id_public_record_initial">If the Company obtains public records (e.g., records of arrest, conviction, civil rights, tax lien, or outstanding judgment) itself without using a third party, then I am entitled to a copy of such records, unless I check the box below. If I am not hired or other adverse action is taken because of the records, then I will receive a copy even if I do check the box below.</label>
	                        </span>
	                        <input id="id_public_record_initial" type="text" name="public_record_initial" maxlength="2" />
	                        </div>
	    					
                            
                            
                                               
	                    </div>
					
                
            
          
            
            
                
                    
						<div class='row optional full'>
	                        
	                            <div>
	                        
	                        <span>
	                        	<label for="id_public_record_waive">I waive my right to receive a copy of any public record described in the paragraph above.</label>
	                        </span>
	                        <input type="checkbox" name="public_record_waive" id="id_public_record_waive" />
	                        </div>
	    					
                            
                            
                                <p class="description"><strong>&dagger;Connecticut applicants/residents: </strong>You need not disclose any conviction record that has been erased pursuant to sections 46b-146, 54-76o or 54-142a of the Connecticut General Statutes. Records subject to erasure under these sections are records pertaining to a finding of delinquency or that a child was a member of a family with service needs, an adjudication as a youthful offender, a criminal charge that was dismissed or nolled, or a criminal charge for which the person was found not guilty or received an absolute pardoned conviction.  Any person whose records were erased within the meaning of these three sections may consider such events to have never occurred and may so swear under oath.</p>
                                <p class="description"><strong>&dagger;Hawaii applicants/residents: </strong>Do not respond to this question until you have been given a conditional offer of employment.</p>
                                <p class="description"><strong>&dagger;Massachusetts applicants/residents:  DO NOT answer this question during the initial application stage or prior to any interview.  Massachusetts law prohibits employers from making inquiries regarding applicants' criminal history information in an initial written application form. You may be required to provide some criminal history information later in the hiring process.</strong></p>                                
                                <p class="description"><strong>&dagger;Pennsylvania applicants/residents:  DO NOT answer this question during the initial application stage or prior to any interview.  You may be required to provide some criminal history information later in the hiring process.</strong></p>
                                <p class="description"><strong>&dagger;Washington applicants/residents:  </strong>You may exclude convictions that occurred over ten years ago.</p>
                                <p class="description">If you have been convicted of a felony and the above disclaimers do not apply to you, please provide city, county, and state of conviction and date and nature of the offense, along with sentencing information.  Enter N/A if this does not apply to you.</p>
                            
                                               
	                    </div>

	                            <div>
	                        
	                        <span>
	                        	<label for="id_conviction_description"></label>
	                        </span>
	                        <textarea id="id_conviction_description" rows="10" cols="40" name="conviction_description"></textarea>
	                        </div>
	    					
                            
                            
                                               
	                    </div>
					
                
            
          
        
    </fieldset>  

    <fieldset class="">  
    
          
            <p class="legend">Job Application</p>  
          
        
          
            <p class="description">For which locations are you applying?</p>  
          

          
            
            
                
                    
						<div class='row required full selectbox'>
	                        
	                            <div>
	                        
	                        <span>

    <fieldset class="hasDesc">  
    
          
            <p class="legend">Applicant's Affirmation and Agreement</p>  
          
        
          
            <p class="description">I hereby affirm that the information on this application (and accompanying resume, if any) is true and complete to the best of my knowledge.                          If I am employed by California Pizza Kitchen (CPK), this document will become part of my permanent record.  I also agree and understand that any misrepresentation                         or omission of any material information on this application or in the interviewing process or on my resume, may preclude me from an offer of employment, or may                         result in a withdrawal of an employment offer, or may result in my discharge from employment if I am already employed at the time the misrepresentation or                         omission is discovered.                          <br /><br />I agree that if employed, I will abide by all policies and procedures established by California Pizza Kitchen.  I understand that my employment is                         "at will ," and that CPK may terminate my employment at any time, with or without cause and with or without notice.  I understand that no manager or                         representative of CPK, other than its President and CEO or his designee, has any authority to enter into any agreement for employment for any specified period                         of time or make any agreement contrary to the foregoing either now, in the past or in the future.  I further understand that such an agreement must be in writing                         and signed by the President, CEO, and me for it to be binding on either CPK or myself.  I further understand that this statement supersedes any prior oral or                         written understanding and bars any future oral understanding to the contrary.                          <br /><br />I also recognize that the use of drugs and alcohol can create an unsafe working environment, and that California Pizza Kitchen                         is a drug-free, smoke-free workplace.</p>

                                <p class="description" id="masspara"><strong>&dagger;Massachusetts Residents:</strong><br />I understand that it is unlawful in Massachusetts to require or administer a lie detector test as a condition of employment or continued employment.  An employer who violates this law shall be subject to criminal penalties and civil liability.</p>
                                <p class="description" id="marypara"><strong>&dagger;Maryland Residents:<br />
                                UNDER MARYLAND LAW, AN EMPLOYER MAY NOT REQUIRE OR DEMAND, AS A CONDITION OF EMPLOYMENT, PROSPECTIVE EMPLOYMENT, OR CONTINUED EMPLOYMENT THAT AN INDIVIDUAL SUBMIT TO OR TAKE A LIE DETECTOR OR SIMILAR TEST. AN EMPLOYER WHO VIOLATES THIS LAW IS GUILTY OF A MISDEMEANOR AND SUBJECT TO A FINE NOT EXCEEDING $100.  </strong>I have carefully read the above Maryland Polygraph Statement and understand the statement.</p>
                                <p class="description" id="washpara"><strong>&dagger;Washington State Residents:</strong><br />You are only required to disclose convictions if the conviction or release from incarceration resulting from conviction occurred in the last ten years.</p>

	<section class="generic">
		<hgroup><h1>It's Your Career, Let it R.O.C.K.</h1></hgroup>
		<div>
			<p>Since we first opened our doors in 1985, our R.O.C.K. philosophy (Respect, Opportunity, Communication, Kindness) has set CPK apart from those both inside and outside our industry. These values allow and encourage our employees to fulfill their potential within the organization.</p>
<p>Together, the values of R.O.C.K. guide our collaboration as a team, and enable us to deliver the very best CPK experience.</p>
		</div>
		<aside class="benefits">
			<hgroup>
				<h2>General Benefits</h2>
			</hgroup>
			<ul>
				<li>Healthcare benefits</li>
				<li>Employee meals</li>
				<li>Dining discounts</li>
				<li>401(k)</li>
				<li>Anniversary Gifts</li>
				<li>And much more!</li>
			</ul>
		</aside>
	</section>
	<section class="tabs clearfix tabs-generic rock">
		<div class="tab first respect">
			<hgroup><h2>Respect</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>Respect guides us as a company and as individuals to value our guests, co-workers, community, vendors and environment. We continually seek out the opinions of team members, guests, and communities to learn and enhance the CPK experience. Simply said, all voices matter, and our focus on respect ensures that all voices are heard.</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/careers/r_company.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="tab opportunity">
			<hgroup><h2>Opportunity</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>Opportunity at CPK is real and tangible. Through exciting career growth and cross training, we're always looking to develop and refine our top talent to drive the business and lead others. CPK challenges its employees to learn about the business at every level. Our most talented employees are provided with opportunities to contribute in a meaningful way, to help fuel the growth of our organization.</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/careers/o_company.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="tab community">
			<hgroup><h2>Communication</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>Communication is actively encouraged at CPK. We have an open-door policy and a culture where everyone is known on a first name basis and always welcome to speak up.</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/careers/c_company.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="tab kindness">
			<hgroup><h2>Kindness</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>Kindness defines the energy and spirit of California Pizza Kitchen. It shapes and guides how we develop, communicate, and hold each other accountable to our high standards.</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/careers/k_company.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="panel-display clearfix">
			<div class="details"><div></div></div>
		</div>
	</section>

	<section class="generic">
		<hgroup><h1>Appetizing careers begin here</h1></hgroup>
		<div>
			<p>CPK is a great place to start or enhance your restaurant career with flexible full - or part-time work. People are our number one priority, and we're always looking for outstanding hospitality-minded individuals to join our team at a place where we encourage you to be yourself. If you're ambitious and motivated, you'll love our energetic environment and dynamic company culture.</p>
		</div>
		<aside class="expand-panels">
			<hgroup>
				<h2>
					<span>Explore</span>
					<span>Opportunities</span>

	<section class="tabs clearfix tabs-generic positions">
		<div class="header">
			<hgroup><h1>Choose an Exciting Career</h1></hgroup>
			<p>Each restaurant offers the following positions</p>
			<a href="/careers/apply/" class="button apply-now"><span>Apply Now</span></a>
		</div>
		<div class="tab first">
			<hgroup><h2>Cook</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>If you have a passion for food and love preparing exciting cuisine, then becoming a member of our line cook team is a unique, fulfilling and gratifying experience. Our Back of House staff is thoroughly trained in how to prepare CPK's amazing dishes with consistency and accuracy, all in a great work environment.</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/careers/cook_company.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="tab">
			<hgroup><h2>Server</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>Servers are the tour guides for the adventure of dining at CPK. Each time a guest visits our restaurants our servers are given the opportunity to take them on a tour of the senses and help them discover all that CPK offers. A passion to please and strong customer service skills are a perfect fit for this position.</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/careers/server_company.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="tab">
			<hgroup><h2>Busser</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>At CPK we know that our bussers act as the backbone of our operation. This position is directly responsible for the flow of our restaurant, seating times of guests and cleanliness. This role is not only challenging and fast paced but rewarding and high energy.</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/careers/busser_company.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="tab">
			<hgroup><h2>Host/Hostess</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>Hosts and Hostesses play a vital role in the experience of our guests, providing the first and last impression of the restaurant. In addition, the flow of the restaurant is controlled by guest seating. Be prepared to set the tone for the restaurant and reflect the positive personality of CPK.</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/careers/hostess_company.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="tab">
			<hgroup class="small"><h2>Counter/Take out<br> &amp; Bar</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>One of the highlights of CPK's layout is our counter and bar that overlook the display kitchen. As guests enjoy their own live kitchen performance our Bar and Counter servers provide them with amazing service, fantastic cocktails and inspiration for their order selection.</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/careers/takeout_company.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		
		<div class="panel-display clearfix">
			<div class="details"><div></div></div>
		</div>
	</section>
	<section class="tabs clearfix tabs-generic steps">
		<div class="header">
			<hgroup><h1>3 Steps to Success</h1></hgroup>
			<p>We want you to grow with us and continue a successful career. Many of our long-standing, successful team members started in entry level opportunities within operations. Here's how we get our members on the path to success.</p>
		</div>
		<div class="tab first step1">
			<hgroup><h2>Certified Trainer</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>Certified trainers are responsible for training all new hires at their restaurant and for assisting the managers in maintaining CPK's high standards. You will become involved in management meetings, assist with special projects and be given the chance to participate in new store openings around the country (when available).</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/careers/trainer_hours_success.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="tab step2">
			<hgroup><h2>Shift Leader</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>Once you have completed the Certified Trainer program, you will be eligible for promotion to either a Dining Room Shift Leader (DSL) or Kitchen Shift Leader (KSL). At CPK, we believe that training is one of the keys to building a successful career. Our Shift Leader programs are one of the best career development tools for team members interested in furthering their career in the restaurant industry. The programs offer in-depth knowledge through each area of management and have been designed to prepare employees for the next level of responsibility. Training for both programs include interactive workbooks, hands-on learning and curriculum testing.</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/careers/shiftleader_hours_success.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="tab step3">
			<hgroup><h2>Management</h2></hgroup>
			<div class="hidden">
				<p>As California Pizza Kitchen continues to grow we will continue to promote from within. The numbers speak for themselves: approximately 30% of managers will be team member promotions.</p>
				<div class="img" style="background-image:url(http://info.cpk.com/cmspages/careers/manager_hours_success.jpg);"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="panel-display clearfix">
			<div class="details"><div></div></div>
		</div>
	</section>
</div>

	<section class="faq-list">
		<hgroup>
			<h1>Careers</h1>
			
				
					<a href="#" class="icon-arrow3 showform">Ask a Question</a> 
				
			
		</hgroup>
		
			<form enctype="multipart/form-data" action="/faqs/careers/" method="POST" class="" novalidate>
				<div>
		            



<div style='display:none'><input type='hidden' name='csrfmiddlewaretoken' value='457689bb690420ba362528eb063dd27b' /></div>




    <fieldset class="first">  
    
          
            <p class="legend">Submit your question and one of our recruiting team members will contact you.</p>  
          
        
          

          
            
            
                
                    
						<div class='row required full'>
	                        
	                            <div>
	                        
	                        <span>
	                        	<label for="id_name">Name</label>
	                        </span>
	                        <input id="id_name" type="text" name="name" maxlength="128" />
	                        </div>
	    					
	                    </div>

	                    </div>

	                            <div>
	                        
	                        <span>
	                        	<label for="id_question">Question</label>
