	                        </div>
	    					
	                    </div>
					
                
            
          
        
    </fieldset>  
  

<input type="submit" value="Submit Inquiry" class="submitInquiry" />

					<a href="#" class="hide-panel">Hide Panel</a>
				</div>
			</form>            
		
		
		<ol>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What sets CPK apart as a hospitality industry employer?</span>
				<p>Our people, our&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/faqs/careers/#rock">R.O.C.K. philosophy</a>, our&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/faqs/careers/#fourkeys">Four Keys to Success</a>&nbsp;and of course our unique&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/menu/">menu</a>. At CPK, we create an environment that inspires and challenges ambitious, motivated people to be themselves and be part of a team working toward a common goal.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What is R.O.C.K.?</span>
				<p>CPK's R.O.C.K. philosophy is our foundation. It stands for Respect, Opportunity, Communication and Kindness. You can learn more about it on our&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/careers/inside-look/">Inside CPK</a>&nbsp;page. We look to hire individuals who embody these values to collaborate as a team, and help us to deliver the very best CPK experience.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What are CPK&#39;s Four Keys to Success?</span>
				<p>CPK has defined the four keys to our success as follows.</p>
<ul>
<li>The First Key is our employees: we make CPK a great place to work.</li>
<li>The Second Key is our guests: we strive to amaze every guest every time.</li>
<li>The Third Key is our focus on sales and profit growth: it's important for everyone to achieve financial success.</li>
<li>The Fourth Key is community: we are deeply committed to supporting our&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/company/community-relations/">local communities</a>.</li>
</ul>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What opportunities are there for me to grow professionally at CPK?</span>
				<p>There are so many opportunities for growth at CPK. Check out our&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/careers/inside-look/">Inside Look video</a>&nbsp;to see some of our success stories. Promotions are performance based, which means your passion and dedication determine your growth. If you're committed to your training and ongoing development, the sky's the limit.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Our goal is to promote 30% of our managers internally from our hourly employees. Our most successful managers take an active role in their development by asking questions, being inquisitive, taking initiative and truly embracing the kitchen. To support your development, we provide a Career Path, as well as the mentorship of Senior General Managers and Senior Kitchen Managers.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What type of management training and development program do you have at CPK?</span>
				<p>CPK offers a 10-week comprehensive Management Training Program. The first 8 weeks are completed at a Certified Training Store (usually within the Region for which you&rsquo;ve been hired), during which you are fully trained and certified in all Front of House and Back of House hourly positions. You also learn our menu, line checks, food ordering and receiving, opening and closing procedures and other management responsibilities.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Your final 2 weeks of training are completed at your home store to give you the opportunity to meet your staff, get acquainted with your guests, become familiar with your store and set you up for success in your position with your management team.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What type of ongoing career development do you offer?</span>
				<p>When you complete your training, you'll be ready to participate in a variety of development opportunities. In addition to CPK Leadership Workshops, we offer Management Decathlons, a 10-event skills challenge hosted by Regional Directors and Trainers that combines fun and professional development.&nbsp;</p>
<p>The Regional Training Manager Program lets managers within our stores become coaches and mentors to increase training and development within each region. CPK will also provide you with a Career Path and guide you towards your desired position. You'll also work with mentors at various levels who will help keep your career moving forward.&nbsp;CPK takes pride in promoting all of our General Managers from within in order to maintain a strong company culture. We believe the best way for CPK to grow is to help our managers grow professionally and personally.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">How is management structured at CPK?</span>
				<p>We typically hire at either the Front of House (FOH) or Back of House (BOH) Manager level. All management promotions are based upon performance in the restaurant. We usually run our restaurants with 3-5 managers per location, depending on the location's sales volume. The management teams consist of multiple levels: FOH Manager, BOH Manager, Assistant General Manager, Kitchen Manager and General Manager. We also have a Senior General Manager and Senior Kitchen Manager level for top performers who are developed into regional mentors.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What type of benefits do you offer?</span>
				<p>Taking good care of our employees is simply part of our recipe for success. We offer a highly achievable bonus program, potential six-figure compensation for Senior General Managers, outstanding 401(k) with company match and medical benefits including Health, Dental and Vision coverage.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">How do I apply?</span>
				You can&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/careers/apply/">apply online</a>.<br />
Hourly applicants:
<ul>
<li>Online applications go directly to the store.</li>
<li>Most stores host weekly group interviews so it would be beneficial to apply in person and ask if and when they are hosting group interviews.</li>
<li>All stores do hourly hiring individually. If there are multiple stores within your area, we recommend applying at all locations individually</li>
</ul>
<p>I am having difficulty uploading my resume. What should I do?</p>
<P>Management applicants: Save your resume in Rich Text Format (.rtf) format and try again.<br />Hourly applicants: Try cutting and pasting your resume into the text box and uploading. All hourly applications are sent directly to the store you apply for.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What are you looking for in qualified management candidates?</span>
				<p>We typically look for a minimum of 2 years of full-service restaurant experience. But for us it goes beyond experience &mdash; we're looking for people who will thrive in our culture and embrace our&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/faqs/careers/#rock">R.O.C.K.</a>&nbsp;philosophy and&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/faqs/careers/#fourkeys">Four Keys to Success</a>. We want managers who are hospitality minded, motivated and can be themselves in a team environment. Of course, we also want them to have fun!</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Does CPK offer a bonus program?</span>
				<p>Yes we do! Each level of management can potentially earn a bonus linked to key achievements in the restaurant. All bonuses are highly attainable based on meeting criteria and rewards for store performance.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">I have submitted my resume online for a posted management opportunity. When can I expect to hear back about scheduling an interview?</span>
				<p>You will be notified by email once we have received your submitted resume. We collect and screen applications for each of the positions posted. A recruiter will typically reach out to you to schedule a phone interview within two weeks of applying if there is interest in moving forward to the next step of the process. If you have not heard from us within three weeks of applying, we may have decided to pursue another applicant. However, don't be discouraged if you don't hear back. Please feel free to reapply for other opportunities with us. We want to find the best fit for everyone!</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What is your management and hourly turnover?</span>
				<p>We hire the best and work hard to keep you! CPK has been benchmarked as having some of the lowest hourly and management turnover in the industry. We have been nationally recognized multiple times by People Report&trade; with their Best People Practices Award for leading the industry in employee retention and low turnover.</p>
			</li>
			
		</ol>
	</section>
</div>
<aside class="main">
	<div>
		<hgroup>
			<h1>FAQs</h1>
		</hgroup>

            </ul>

    <section class="main-slider">
		<div id="controls"></div>
        <div class="asset">
            <ul class="clearfix" id="main-slider">
                    
                        <!---->
                        
						<li>
							
								
								<img src="http://info.cpk.com/images/carousels/faqs/110421_goldsmith_cpk1355_carousel.jpg" />

	<section class="faq-list">
		<hgroup>
			<h1>Menu &amp; Ordering</h1>
			
		</hgroup>
		
		
		<ol>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What kinds of ingredients do you use in your menu items? Where can I locate your nutritional information?</span>
				<p>We strive to source premium ingredients and fresh vegetables and herbs are hand-cut in our kitchens. We value your dietary needs, which is why we provide comprehensive nutritional information on our website. Many of our menu items can be modified to fit your needs. We offer options like honey-wheat with whole grain pizza crust and multi-grain pasta. So explore our menu. One bite and we&rsquo;re sure you&rsquo;ll understand the delicious difference.</p>
<p>There are several documents you can download to help you navigate our menu and guide you if you're interested in modifying your meal.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="http://d32fh83nwkznvc.cloudfront.net/documents/nutrition_facts.pdf" target="_blank">Nutritional Information</a></li>
<li><a href="http://d32fh83nwkznvc.cloudfront.net/documents/vegetarian_and_vegan_info.pdf" target="_blank">Vegetarian Information</a></li>
<li><a href="http://d32fh83nwkznvc.cloudfront.net/documents/allergen_information.pdf" target="_blank">Allergen Information</a></li>
<li><a href="http://d32fh83nwkznvc.cloudfront.net/documents/gluten_free_menu.pdf" target="_blank">Gluten-Free Menu</a></li>
</ul>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Can I order CPK for takeout or delivery?</span>
				<p>Absolutely! If you want your CPK to go, you can easily order online or call your local CPK. We'll have your order ready to pick up when you arrive. Delivery is available at many of our locations &mdash; check with your local CPK to find out your options</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Does CPK cater?</span>
				<p>Yes. We've designed a&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/catering/menu/">Catering Menu</a>&nbsp;featuring a wide selection of signature CPK items. We offer options for parties large and small to fit within any budget. We even have a&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/catering/mobile-kitchen/">mobile kitchen</a>&nbsp;that can bring everything we need to cater your party -- including the kitchen sink.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">How do I contact you about a recent experience I had as a guest at CPK?</span>
				<p>Please tell us about your dining experience by clicking on any of the&nbsp;<a href="http://webhost.cpk.com/contactus/contactus.asp">Contact Us</a>&nbsp;links on the site or by calling 1-800-91-WE-CARE between 7:00 am and 12:00 am Pacific Time.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Does CPK have a kids menu?</span>
				<p>Our award-winning&nbsp;<a href="http://d32fh83nwkznvc.cloudfront.net/documents/cpkids_menu.pdf" target="_blank">CPKids Menu</a>&nbsp;is a popular favorite with children. Designed to please kids 10 and under, your little ones are sure to find something they love.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">How often does the CPK menu change?</span>
				<p>We introduce new menu items throughout the year, with two bigger launches in June and November. Check our&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/menu/#newmenuitems">New Items</a>&nbsp;menu to discover the latest CPK creations.</p>
			</li>
			
		</ol>
	</section>
</div>

	<section class="faq-list">
		<hgroup>
			<h1>Gift Cards</h1>
			
		</hgroup>
		
		
		<ol>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">How do I purchase CPK Gift Cards?</span>
				<p>You can purchase CPK Gift Cards from all of our full-service&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/locations/">California Pizza Kitchen locations</a>. You can also&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpkcard.com/splash.aspx">order gift cards online</a>&nbsp;today! Our new electronic gift card option allows gift givers the opportunity to send their gift instantly.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Can I order a CPK Gift Card online and pick it up at my local restaurant? Can I order a CPK Gift Card online and pick it up at my local restaurant? </span>
				<p>At this time you are not able to pick up your online Gift Card orders at our restaurants. When you order online, your cards will be shipped directly to the address you provide. Or you can purchase an eGift card and have it emailed instantly.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Do CPK Gift Cards expire?</span>
				<p>No, our gift cards never expire.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Where can I use my CPK Gift Card? </span>
				<p>CPK Gift Cards can be used at any California Pizza Kitchen (CPK) in the United States EXCEPT for airport locations, stadiums, universities, travel plazas and the Mirage Hotel in Las Vegas. They are also not valid in Guam or international locations.&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/locations/">Find a CPK location</a>&nbsp;near you.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Can I use my LA Food Show Gift Card at CPK?</span>
				<p>Yes, you can use them at any California Pizza Kitchen (CPK) or ASAP in the United States EXCEPT for airport locations, stadiums, universities, travel plazas and the Mirage Hotel in Las Vegas. They are also not valid in Guam or international locations.&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/locations/">Find a CPK location</a>&nbsp;near you.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Are CPK Gift Cards accepted at International CPK locations?</span>
				<p>No, our international locations do not accept CPK Gift Cards.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Does the recipient of a CPK Gift Card have to use the card for menu items that are photographed and appear on the front of the card?</span>
				<p>No. California Pizza Kitchen Gift Cards can be used toward any item listed on our menu.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Can I reload my CPK Gift Card?</span>
				<p>Yes, CPK Gift Cards can be&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpkcard.com/splash.aspx">reloaded online</a>&nbsp;at cpk.com or at any participating CPK or CPK ASAP restaurant. Gift cards cannot be reloaded at airport locations, stadiums, universities, travel plazas and the Mirage Hotel in Las Vegas. They are also not reloadable in Guam or international locations.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Is it safe to give my credit card information online?</span>
				<p>Keeping your information secure is a top priority for us. When you place your order through our website, your order information, including credit card number, is transmitted to our secure server. To validate the security of your order, please review the Trustwave validation seal when entering your payment information.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">In what dollar amounts are CPK Gift Cards available?</span>
				<p>CPK Gift Cards are available in whole dollar denominations, in five-dollar increments, from $10 to $500.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Does CPK charge a monthly service fee for unused balances left on my CPK Gift Card?</span>
				<p>No, a monthly service fee is not applied to our gift cards.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Will you sell my information to other companies?</span>
				<p>We are as concerned about ensuring the privacy of your information as you are. CPK will not trade, rent or sell your personal information. We will also never share your credit card number, email address, or other personal information without your prior authorization. For more details, please refer to our&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/privacy">privacy policy</a>.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">I need a CPK Gift Card today and I do not live near a California Pizza Kitchen restaurant. Where else can I find CPK Gift Cards?</span>
				<p>You can purchase CPK Gift Cards&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpkcard.com/">on this Web site</a>. Our new electronic gift card option allows gift givers the opportunity to send their gift instantly via email.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">How do I check the balance on my CPK Gift Card?</span>
				<p>You can check your balance by going to any of our full-service California Pizza Kitchen restaurants,&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/">cpk.com</a>&nbsp;or by calling our automated toll free number at 1-888-351-2594.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What are my shipping options and how long does it take to receive a gift card?</span>
				<p>Shipping time will depend on the delivery method you select. Gift cards can be sent to either a physical street address or a recognizable post office box. Or, you can purchase our new eGift cards and it will be instantly emailed to you.</p>
<p>We recommend shipping purchases over $100 via FedEx. Bear in mind that Federal Express only ships to physical street addresses and not P.O. Boxes, and that a signature is required for delivery to a place of business. FedEx will make three attempts to deliver a package.</p>
<p>Delivery options and charges:</p>
<ul>
<li>United States Postal Service (USPS) Standard Mail 5-7 business days (tracking not included) $0.50</li>
<li>Federal Express Ground Residential** 3-7 business days (tracking included) $6.50</li>
<li>Federal Express 2 Day 2 days (tracking included) $11.25</li>
<li>Federal Express Next Day Air 1 day (tracking included) $20.00</li>
</ul>
<p>Orders received after 11:00 a.m. (PST) Friday and prior to 11:00 a.m. (PST) on Monday will be shipped on Monday. All orders placed after 11:00 a.m. (PT) will be processed the next business day. Time of delivery will depend upon the shipping option you choose.</p>
<p>** Not available in Hawaii and Alaska</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Can I place a CPK Gift Card order for delivery to Hawaii or Alaska?</span>
				<p>Yes, we deliver to Hawaii and Alaska via USPS Standard Mail and FedEx. Please note that USPS deliveries to Hawaii and Alaska take approximately 7-14 business days. Standard Overnight and FedEx 2-Day are available for deliveries to Alaska. Hawaii offers FedEx 2-Day Shipping only. Also note that while shipping might indicate overnight and 2-Day, there are regions in these areas that require extra time for delivery.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Do you deliver on Saturday or Sunday?</span>
				<p>No, at this time we do not deliver on Saturday or Sunday. However, if a gift card is shipping via USPS there is a possibility of it arriving on a Saturday.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Do you deliver outside of the United States?</span>
				<p>No, at this time, we do not deliver outside of the United States.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Can I place a CPK Gift Card order for delivery to Canada?</span>
				<p>We do not deliver to Canadian addresses because, at this time, we do not have any CPK restaurants in Canada.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Can I place a CPK Gift Card order for delivery in the United States if I live in Canada? </span>
				<p>No, currently we cannot accept international forms of payment for online orders.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Can I place a CPK Gift Card order for delivery to a P.O. Box?</span>
				<p>Federal Express does not ship to P.O. Boxes, however, USPS Standard Mail does. If you require delivery to a P.O. Box please choose USPS Standard Mail.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Can I place a CPK Gift Card order for delivery to APO addresses?</span>
				<p>At this time we cannot deliver gift cards to APO addresses.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Can I place a CPK Gift Card order if I have an APO address? </span>
				<p>At this time we cannot accept an online order if you have an APO billing address.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">I chose USPS Standard Mail before and received my CPK Gift Card in 3 days, and another time it took 7 days. Why?</span>
				<p>USPS Standard Mail service is reliant on the distance the order has to travel, as well as mail volume. During peak mail times, service may take longer than usual.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Will I get confirmation of my CPK Gift Card order? </span>
				<p>Yes, after your order is placed, you will be emailed a confirmation that will include your order details.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">How do I track my order?</span>
				<p>If you chose Federal Express, your tracking number will be emailed to you when your order is shipped. To track your order, use your tracking number at&nbsp;<a href="http://www.fedex.com/">www.fedex.com</a>. Tracking is not available for USPS Mail orders.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What if I use USPS Standard Mail and my CPK Gift Card order takes longer than expected or never shows up? </span>
				<p>Orders not delivered in 14 business days will be replaced. The original CPK Gift Card will be deactivated and marked as stolen, and new cards will be issued. We recommend that you plan for USPS Standard Mail service to take 5-7 business days. If your order does not arrive in that time, please call 1-800-91-WECARE or email us at&nbsp;<a href="mailto:CustomerService@cpk.com">CustomerService@cpk.com</a>.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What happens if my CPK Gift Card does not work?</span>
				<p>CPK Gift Cards that don't work properly can be loaded onto another card at any California Pizza Kitchen restaurant. You can also call our toll free number for further assistance at 1-800-91-WECARE.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Can I return a CPK Gift Card?</span>
				<p>Your CPK Gift Card cannot be redeemed for cash or credit, except as required by law.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Who can I contact if I have questions or problems with my CPK Gift Card order?</span>
				<p>You can email us at&nbsp;<a href="mailto:CustomerService@cpk.com">CustomerService@cpk.com</a>&nbsp;or call our toll free number at 1-800-91-WECARE.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What happens if my CPK Gift Card is lost or stolen?</span>
				<p>Please treat your card like cash, as CPK and CPK ASAP are not responsible for unauthorized use. If lost or stolen, your CPK Gift Card can only be replaced for the remaining value with original proof of purchase, including the gift card identification number. Please e-mail&nbsp;<a href="mailto:CustomerService@cpk.com">CustomerService@cpk.com</a>&nbsp;or call our toll free number at 1-800-91-WECARE. Be sure to include your full name, contact information, order date and order number.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Who can I contact for help or information about CPK Gift Cards?</span>
				<p>Email us at&nbsp;<a href="mailto:CustomerService@cpk.com">CustomerService@cpk.com</a>&nbsp;or call 1-800-91-WECARE.</p>
			</li>
			
		</ol>
	</section>
</div>

	<section class="faq-list">
		<hgroup>
			<h1>Catering &amp; Events</h1>
			
		</hgroup>
		
		
		<ol>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What&#39;s the best way to order catering services?</span>
				<p>You can order online or contact your&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/locations/">local CPK</a>. For large orders, corporate or private parties, contact our catering department by filling out a simple form&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/catering/let-us-help/">online</a>&nbsp;or emailing us at&nbsp;<a href="mailto:catering@cpk.com">catering@cpk.com</a>.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">Does CPK deliver?</span>
				<p>Yes, many of our locations deliver. Contact your&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/locations/">local CPK</a>&nbsp;to find out if you're in our delivery zone and to explore delivery options.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">How early do I need to place my order?</span>
				<p>We always strive to meet your time constraints. Some orders may require 24-hour notice. For details, please contact your&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/locations/">local CPK</a>, fill out a simple form&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/catering/let-us-help/">online</a>&nbsp;to contact our dedicated catering managers.</p>
			</li>
			
			<li>
				<span class="q">What are your options to catering a big event?</span>
				<p>In Southern California, our full-service professionally staffed&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/catering/mobile-kitchen/">35-foot mobile kitchen</a>&nbsp;is ready to get trucking and turn heads at your next event. This restaurant on wheels includes ovens, saut&eacute; stations and coolers, which makes it easy to bring our kitchen to your place. Fill out a simple form&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/catering/let-us-help/">online</a>&nbsp;or email&nbsp;<a href="mailto:mobilekitchen@cpk.com">mobilekitchen@cpk.com</a>for details and pricing.</p>
<p>Our pop up kitchens, featuring easily visible CPK signage, bring CPK's original menu and friendly service to fairs and corporate events with an experienced staff that can prepare CPK dishes onsite. Recommended for events of 200 people or more. Fill out a simple form&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cpk.com/catering/let-us-help/">online</a>&nbsp;for details.</p>
			</li>
			
		</ol>
	</section>
</div>
